title: Bug 4971 - Strange 'copy package'
description:
Bug 4971 - There is a strange behavior when performing a 'copy package' operation in the org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui module of jdt.ui.

To reproduce the issue:
OB: When performing the 'copy package' operation in the org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui module of jdt.ui by selecting xxx as the destination package, an unexpected behavior occurs.
EB: The 'copy package' operation should copy the selected package to the specified destination package without any unexpected behavior.
SR:
1. Create a new project named xxx.
2. Open the Package viewer.
3. Select a package in project A.
4. From the context menu, choose copy package.
5. Specify xxx as the destination package.
